items.content_html: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.
items.title: Devjosef/DocuComp: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.

items.content_html: **ToDo Application** A lightweight ToDo application built with Node.js. This app allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks, ensuring efficient task management. Featuring a simple interface and real-time updates, it uses MongoDB for persistent data storage. Perfect for improving productivity and keeping track of daily tasks.
items.title: thomas7272/ToDoApplication: **ToDo Application**  A lightweight ToDo application built with Node.js. This app allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks, ensuring efficient task management. Featuring a simple interface and real-time updates, it uses MongoDB for persistent data storage. Perfect for improving productivity and keeping track of daily tasks.

items.content_html: ThingJS 3D Engine (t3d) is a lightweight, web-first, and extendable 3D rendering library.
items.title: uinosoft/t3d.js: ThingJS 3D Engine (t3d) is a lightweight, web-first, and extendable 3D rendering library.

items.content_html: A lightweight reactive data library for web applications. Designed over composable primitives.
items.title: emberjs/data: A lightweight reactive data library for web applications. Designed over composable primitives.

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight, and secure WAF. Developed based on Nginx and connected as a reverse proxy. Protect your web applications from common attacks and exploits.
items.title: chaitin/SafeLine: A simple, lightweight, and secure WAF. Developed based on Nginx and connected as a reverse proxy. Protect your web applications from common attacks and exploits.

items.content_html: A small lightweight HTTP server that converts photos, images and scanned documents to text using optical character recognition by utilizing the power of Google Tesseract.
items.title: hertzg/tesseract-server: A small lightweight HTTP server that converts photos, images and scanned documents to text using optical character recognition by utilizing the power of Google Tesseract.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript-based feature flag manager that enables conditional feature activation based on user-specific rules and percentage rollouts.
items.title: micheal081/features-manager: A lightweight TypeScript-based feature flag manager that enables conditional feature activation based on user-specific rules and percentage rollouts.

items.content_html: good.db is a lightweight Node.js library for simple local database operations with JSON files. Organize, manage, and manipulate data easily.
items.title: good-db/good.db:   good.db is a lightweight Node.js library for simple local database operations with JSON files. Organize, manage, and manipulate data easily.

items.title: styils/styils: Lightweight and fast css-in-js solution. Support for topics, Polymorphism, SSR, Sourcemap, Full type definitions

items.content_html: This repository contains the project I developed to interact with the local Ollama API. Ollama is a lightweight and extensible framework for running open-source language models on your own computer.
items.title: HellFiveOsborn/chatai_ollama: This repository contains the project I developed to interact with the local Ollama API. Ollama is a lightweight and extensible framework for running open-source language models on your own computer.

items.title: avvo-na/ftll: A lightweight, open-source, mod launcher for DayZ Standalone.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)

items.content_html: A lightweight, highly configurable MQTT proxy built on Pipy for efficient MQTT traffic handling, enabling secure and scalable IoT communication. Optimized for low latency and high throughput, the Pipy MQTT Proxy enhances MQTT protocol routing and load balancing with easy deployment and management.
items.title: flomesh-io/pipy-mqtt-proxy: A lightweight, highly configurable MQTT proxy built on Pipy for efficient MQTT traffic handling, enabling secure and scalable IoT communication. Optimized for low latency and high throughput, the Pipy MQTT Proxy enhances MQTT protocol routing and load balancing with easy deployment and management.

items.title: Cercedo/root-react-template: A lightweight template to start a React project and build maintainable, scalable and high-quality applications.

items.content_html: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.
